summary: This bill, the American Victims of Terrorism Compensation Act, amends the Justice for United States Victims of State Sponsored Terrorism Act to clarify and enhance funding for victims. It specifies the distribution of funds from the Binance Holdings Limited forfeiture, DOJ assets, and Treasury forfeiture funds into the United States Victims of State Sponsored Terrorism Fund, as well as timing for deposits. The bill also changes annual payment authorizations, mandates reports from the Special Master and Comptroller General on fund activity and administration, and adjusts the use of Department of Justice personnel and funds. It focuses on ensuring consistent and meaningful distributions to eligible claimants.
